content:
Hanyu Shi received the B.Sc., M.Sc., and Ph.D. degrees from Beijing Normal University in 2014, 2017, and 2022, respectively. He is a research professor at East China Normal University, Shanghai, China. His research interests include radiative transfer and parameter estimation.
Academic experience:
2025.03 – Present, East China Normal University, Research Professor 2022.03 – 2025.02, Southwest University, Professor 2019.09 – 2022.01, Beijing Normal University, PhD Student 2018.07 – 2019.08, Beijing Normal University, Research Assistant 2017.07 – 2018.06, University of Virginia, PhD Student 2014.09 – 2017.06, Beijing Normal University, MSc Student 2010.09 – 2014.06, Beijing Normal University, BSc Student
summary: Hanyu Shi received the B.Sc., M.Sc., and Ph.D. degrees from Beijing Normal University in 2014, 2017, and 2022, respectively. He is a research professor at East China Normal University, Shanghai, China.
title: Hanyu Shi
